page.title: 10 SCHOOLING CHANGES
page.content: Over the years there have been many changes in school life.Buildings are much lighter and airy.Teachers are not as strict or cruel.Children no longer sit in uncomfortable desks in rows and tiers but in individual desks and chairs in groups.Lessons are more relaxed and the pupils spend more time finding out for themselves rather than chanting replies to teachers questions.More subjects besides reading,writing,and arithmetic,have come into present day schools like art,craft,physical education,sewing, dancing,and science.Children are healthier as a result of better food including school dinners.Most schools have inside toilets.More teaching aids are now used e.g.television,radio, computers,and calculaters.School has become a livelier,happy place.
